about_meta: WackyFoki is a platform for sharing weird and unique recipes from around the world.
about_p1: WackyFoki is a community-based platform for people around the world to share their bizarre and creative recipes. We aim to celebrate strange, experimental dishes that go beyond traditional boundaries.
about_p2: Anyone can easily upload recipes, view others‚Äô creations, and react with comments and likes. Just because a dish looks weird doesn‚Äôt mean it tastes bad!
about_p3: If you want to explore food from a fresh perspective with fun and creativity, WackyFoki welcomes you.
about_ops_body: This site is personally operated and may generate income via Google AdSense and partnerships. Copyright for each post belongs to the author, and inappropriate content may be removed without notice.
about_notice: ‚Äª Content is user-submitted and may be deleted without notice by the administrator if inappropriate.
contact_meta: Want to contact WackyFoki? Reach out anytime.
contact_p1: Have questions about WackyFoki? For partnership inquiries, bug reports, or feedback, feel free to contact us via the email below.
contact_owner_body: This site is operated personally by OriJin and is currently a test project. All inquiries should be sent to contact@wackyfoki.com.
contact_notice: ‚Äª Replies are typically sent within 1‚Äì2 business days.
